rules_text:
{T}: Until your next turn, target creature you control has base power equal to its base toughness and gains vigilance. Activate only as a sorcery.
Team [i](Cast either side or both. When you cast both, the back is a token.)[/i]
flavor_text2: [i]“I have a life, you know. I can't just drop everything and go off to die in glorious combat.”[/i]
